product_name: Life Gear Glow Stick with Whistle
long_description: The Life Gear Glow Stick with Whistle helps you see and be seen on nighttime strolls or campouts, and can assist in safety situations. Reusable, non-toxic glow stick offers light for changing a tire, searching the car trunk, warning other drivers or signaling for help. It also makes for a great party decoration, bedtime reading light or sporting event accessory. Bright LED bulb provides up to 200 hrs. of battery life (on flasher mode). 4 different safety signaling modes help in emergency situations: color glow stick, color flasher, bright white flashlight and emergency whistle. 1-hour auto-off switch helps preserve battery life. 3 button cell batteries included.
short_description: The Life Gear Glow Stick with Whistle helps you see and be seen on nighttime strolls or campouts, and can assist in safety situations.
